metadata.othernotes:
Zeke is the leader of this duo, and as such all targets will be going towards him by default.
Pandoria is accompanying him because the two work best as a pair, and would be much weaker if they were made separately. Pandoria will be present 95% of the time, and will only disappear in very specific circumstances (e.g. specific targeted interactions or the like). Therefore, when targeting them you can assume that she is always there.

Zeke is a flamboyant swordsman with a flare for the dramatic, and an unlucky streak a mile long. Accompanied by his Blade, companion, and all-around handler Pandoria. Disowned from the Tantalese throne by his father, Zeke and Pandoria traveled across Alrest in search of the Aegis Blade, eventually joining forces with them.



- Zeke's age is outright stated to be 25 in XC2; I am treating him as vaguely older than that in case anyone ever wants to make Rex from XC3:FR
- Pandoria's age is harder to estimate as her species, a Blade, has a life cycle where they go into a dormant 'Core Crystal' stage until they are awakened with new memories but the same personality. She could be hundred of years old, but has only been awakened for at least a dedade.
- Both of them strip at the same time. The strip order is as follows:
-- gloves/gloves (extra)
-- pauldrons/dress (minor/major)
-- coat/bra (major/important)
-- boots/boots (minor)
-- pants/shorts (major)
-- boxers / panties (important)
- Zeke and Pandoria are both filling out the same 'space' at the table, but between them they aren't taking the game seriously enough to have an AI above 'average' - at least under normal circumstances.

They are also accompanied by their mascot, a turtle named Turters. Turters goes missing during the game and is a collectible the player can unlock by finishing a game with them.

- Zeke is a chuunibyou (someone who talks and acts like they are an over the top fantasy character), of the 'actually has incredible powers' variety. He does this as a bit of an act, as while he is generally goofy, he has a lot of hidden depth and worldly insight to offer. He's well-versed in the politics of his world, and is capable of incredible feats.
- He's a Blade Eater; part of Pandoria's Core Crystal was transplanted onto his heart by Amalthus before the events of the game in order to save his life. This is a bit of a taboo topic in the setting.
- Zeke refuses to take a life except as an absolute last resort, holding it as one of his greatest strengths that he never takes the easy way out.

case.name: This is Zeke ft. Pandoria
case.description: Zeke is the main player, but is accompanied by Pandoria. She often mimics Zeke's poses, and chimes in with snarky comments at his expense. You can assume Pandoria is always present.

case.name: Pandoria strips too!
case.description: Pandoria offers to strip whenever Zeke does, and tries to match what he strips as best she can. See each stripping case for details and markers.

case.name: Zeke's Chest Scars
case.description: Zeke has taken his coat off, revealing the core crystal piece lodged in his chest. Pandoria has also just taken her bra off.

case.name: Zeke + Pandoria Nudity
case.description: Highlighting this case as this is a man and a woman getting naked at the same time instead of one or the other.

case.name: Zeke/Pandoria Thigh-sex
case.description: Zeke and Pandoria's default 'heavy masturbating' poses have them performing intercrural sex, or 'thigh sex'. Check for the marker condition. Each marker is tagged with a different letter to designate which comment they are making when they start this.

case.name: Zeke/Pandoria Sex
case.description: Zeke and Pandy may have penetrative sex for the last part of their masturbation (but it is not guaranteed, check the conditions).

notes.note: If you want to ask Pandoria / Pandy questions, you could draw attention to the fact that some of her body parts are lightbulbs, such as a lightbulb in her head.. and her tail. Her specific race is known as a "Blade".

If you want to ask Pandoria / Pandy questions, you could draw attention to the fact that some of her body parts are lightbulbs, such as a lightbulb in her head.. and her tail. Her specific race is known as a "Blade".

If you want to ask Pandoria / Pandy questions, you could draw attention to the fact that some of her body parts are lightbulbs, such as a lightbulb in her head.. and her tail. Her specific race is known as a "Blade".
If there are no other girls and the human is a gay man, some of Pandy's dialogue is toned down or disabled - but not all of it, as her being here is a core part of their character slot
What we have here is a rare opportunity for a female character to directly demonstrate to Jura (and Meia) how to please a man! Please let me know what you think.
note; make a joke about the flamebringer and brighid
note to self; make this set her nickname to both Sucrose and Sweetie in the future when that functionality is added to the CE
note to self; this lets sucrose set her own marker zp_ff_enable

as a note, as a major gameplay feature of xenoblade 2, you make use of different blades on a regular basis (each character can have up to 3 equipped, some are story based like Mythra and some are side content like Kora). (zeke cannot use mythra/pyra, only rex can)
dromarch is a beast shape Blade who is basically a big furry lion
zeke and pandy have a very bad history with bandits, which they can explain in follow-up lines

the purple lightning dreamsmasher and the big bang edge are both different names for the same weapon; as far as I can tell zeke just randomly calls it one or the other. or, more specifically, big bang edge is the gameplay name for the default weapon configuration of the PLD? you can have jura point out the discrepancy or ignore it entirely lmao
they say the marker zeke_meia_self4a in both lines in case you only want to write one response. equally, they have different markers in case you want to do a branch based on who said what line.
I imagine in the next case zeke can/will explain that it's part of pandoria's core that is lodged in his chest
this case locks in the intercouse forfeit so that it is continued for the rest of their forfeit
just a funny easter egg of sorts, don't take it too seriously :P
just a funny easter egg of sorts, don't take it too seriously :P
follow up line; pandy explaining that he's just making this up... or IS he?

markers.marker: If set to 1, Zeke and Pandoria *can* (but are not guaranteed to) have sex for their forfeit.
If active, Zeke is in EOSJ mode.
Pandoria speaks during the game start.

Pandoria is the one speaking when this marker is being said. This marker doesn't always appear, but is used in cases where you might need to differentiate, e.g. if there are two versions of a single line, one where she speaks and one where she doesnt.
if set to 1, Pandoria's dialogue is de-emphasised at certain moments.
Pandoria strips her boots while Zeke removes his boots.
Pandoria strips her bottoms (underwear) while Zeke removes his own boxers.
Pandoria strips her bra when Zeke takes off his pants.
Pandoria strips her bra when Zeke takes off his pants. Variant that comments on Zeke forgetting his pants before.
Pandoria strips off her dress when Zeke takes off his coat.
Pandoria strips her ribbon when Zeke removes his pauldrons.
Pandoria is going to strip what she can at the same time that Zeke does, starting with her own gloves.
A silly line for penis reveals where Pandy gives them a rating (based on their size tag, ranking size and cuteness)

pendingLines.line: ~Name~, take off that ridiculous eyepatch this instant! You're infringing on my copyright!
{pandy}What do you mean? Zeke has loads of good qualities! Like uh...and huh...{!reset}
